variable.name: QuitLabel2
variable.description: Label2 for skin settings Quit function item

variable.name: MovieEntryPointLabel2
variable.description: Label2 for skin settings Movies function item

variable.name: TVShowEntryPoint
variable.description: Action for TV Show home button

variable.name: TVShowEntryPointLabel2
variable.description: Label2 for skin settings TV Show function item

variable.name: MusicEntryPointLabel2
variable.description: Label2 for skin settings Music function item

variable.name: TVEntryPointLabel2
variable.description: Label2 for skin settings TV function item

variable.name: RadioEntryPointLabel2
variable.description: Label2 for skin settings Radio function item

variable.name: SettingsLocationPointLabel2
variable.description: Label2 for skin settings location item

value.condition: Window.IsActive(Settings.xml) | Window.IsActive(SettingsCategory.xml) | Windows.IsActive(SettingsProfile.xml) | Window.IsActive(SettingsScreenCalibration.xml) | Window.IsActive(SettingsSystemInfo.xml) | Window.IsActive(EventLog.xml) | Window.IsActive(SkinSettings.xml)

includes.expression: [[container.content(albums) | container.content(artists)] + Skin.HasSetting(56_Music_Info)] | [container.content(episodes) + Skin.HasSetting(56_Episodes_Info)] | [[container.content(MusicVideos) | container.content(movies) | container.content(tvshows) | container.content(seasons)] + Skin.HasSetting(56_Posters_Info)]

[[container.content(albums) | container.content(artists)] + Skin.HasSetting(56_Music_Gallery)] | [container.content(episodes) + Skin.HasSetting(56_Episodes_Gallery)] | [[container.content(MusicVideos) | container.content(movies) | container.content(tvshows) | container.content(seasons)] + Skin.HasSetting(56_Posters_Gallery)]
